brand_identity.name: BharatBazaar (Internal Code: Project Mesho)
brand_identity.core_philosophy: The Digital Mandi: Vibrant, chaotic energy of an Indian bazaar meets the precision of a Swiss control room.

usage_rules.headings: Use Manrope for all headings. Bold (700) or ExtraBold (800). Tight tracking (-0.02em).
usage_rules.prices: Use Manrope ExtraBold for prices. Indian Rupee symbol (â‚¹) must be same size as text.
usage_rules.data_tables: Use Inter for table content. Use JetBrains Mono for SKUs, Order IDs, and Inventory Counts.

primary.description: Meesho Pink - High energy, used for 'Buy Now', 'Add to Cart', and primary CTAs.

secondary.description: Deep Violet - Used for 'Wholesale' badges, premium features, and admin accents.

accent.description: Marigold Yellow - Used for 'Discount' tags, 'Offer' banners, and alerts.

success.description: Emerald Green - Stock available, Order Delivered, Profit positive.

destructive.description: Red - Out of stock, Order Cancelled, Loss.

storefront.spacing: Generous padding (py-12) for sections to allow visual breathing room amidst dense product lists.
storefront.mobile_first: True. All grids start at grid-cols-2 (mobile) -> grid-cols-4 (tablet) -> grid-cols-6 (desktop).
storefront.card_style: Flat, 1px border-gray-200, rounded-lg. No heavy shadows. Images take up 70% of card height.

admin.grid_type: Mode B: The Control Room Grid
admin.sidebar: Fixed width (280px), collapsible. Dark slate background.
admin.card_style: Neumorphic Dark. bg-slate-800, border-slate-700, shadow-lg. Rounded-xl.

buttons.primary: bg-[#f43397] hover:bg-[#d61f7a] text-white rounded-full px-8 py-3 font-bold shadow-lg hover:shadow-xl transition-all active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: bg-white border-2 border-[#f43397] text-[#f43397] hover:bg-pink-50 rounded-full px-8 py-3 font-bold transition-all
buttons.admin_action: bg-slate-700 hover:bg-slate-600 text-white rounded-md px-4 py-2 text-sm font-medium border border-slate-600

cards.product: group relative bg-white border border-gray-100 rounded-2xl overflow-hidden hover:shadow-xl transition-all duration-300
cards.stat_card: bg-slate-800 border border-slate-700 p-6 rounded-xl flex flex-col justify-between hover:border-slate-600 transition-colors

inputs.style: h-12 rounded-lg border-gray-300 focus:border-[#f43397] focus:ring-[#f43397] bg-gray-50 focus:bg-white transition-all
inputs.admin_style: h-10 rounded-md border-slate-700 bg-slate-900 text-white focus:border-indigo-500 focus:ring-indigo-500

textures.noise: Use a subtle SVG noise overlay on the Admin Dashboard background to reduce banding and add 'tactile' feel.
textures.patterns: Use subtle geometric Indian patterns (mandala/paisley) as low-opacity backgrounds in Storefront headers.

motion.hover: All interactive elements must have a scale-105 or lift effect.
motion.page_load: Staggered fade-in for product lists (Framer Motion).
motion.cart_add: Confetti or 'fly-to-cart' animation when adding items.

glassmorphism.usage: Use heavily in Mobile Bottom Navigation and Sticky Headers.

instructions_to_main_agent.general: You are building a dual-personality app. The '/admin' routes must feel like a completely different app (Dark, Dense, Serious) compared to the '/' routes (Light, Playful, Spacious).
instructions_to_main_agent.state_management: Use Context API for Cart and Auth. Admin state (Inventory/Orders) should be mocked with local state or simple JSON server logic.
instructions_to_main_agent.mock_data: Generate realistic Indian context data. Names: 'Priya Sharma', 'Rahul Traders'. Products: 'Banarasi Saree', 'Wireless Earbuds', 'Masala Oats'. Currency: 'â‚¹'.
instructions_to_main_agent.charts: Use Recharts for the Admin Dashboard. Focus on 'Sales vs Return' and 'Inventory Health'.
instructions_to_main_agent.pos_system: The POS page in Admin should be touch-friendly. Big buttons for 'Add Item', 'Checkout', 'Print Invoice'.

UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: `transition: all`. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms.
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add `.App { text-align: center; }` in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text.
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style.
